content.content:
Hi all,

Can you please tell me why this is a wrong solution?

Thank you so much.

select distinct p.session_id from playback as p
inner join ads as a
on p.customer_id = a.customer_id 
and a.timestamp not between p.start_time and p.end_time

select session_id
from Playback p
left join Ads a
on p.customer_id = a.customer_id
where end_time >= start_time and a.timestamp not between start_time and end_time;


Does someone know why the above solution could not pass the submission?
